checklist.title: Slight Attack Clodsire
checklist.notes: A Clodsire with slight Attack investment can win Charged Move ties against high rank Clodsire while retaining its performance in general matchups.

checklist.title: Mirror Slayer Clodsire
checklist.notes: Clodsire guarantees a Mud Shot breakpoint against itself with 98.54 Attack or higher. This variant has a strong advantage against Poison Sting Clodsire, but sacrifices bulk in its general matchups. Outside of the mirror matchup, it wins Charged Move ties against Registeel, Steelix, and Lickitung.

checklist.title: Gligar Slayer Quagsire
checklist.notes: Quagsire needs 113.3 Attack or higher to secure even shield matchups against most Shadow Gligar with its Charged Move damage. This spread also keeps at least 109.12 Defense to guarantee a Wing Attack bulkpoint against Shadow Gligar, and 110.5 Defense to gain a Counter bulkpoint against most Medicham.
